title: 【文宣拆彈】Twitter Reddit點樣對付五毛

replies.msg:
最近NBA Blizzard 單野令到外國多左好多人關注香港同中國問題。首先多謝各位落力做文宣同推文，Reddit個熱門有一半都係關於Blizzard NBA。

講番重點就係雖然有大部分言論支持HK不過都有小量5毛。5毛論點9成9都係話示威者暴力點點點，我見到好少人拆，所以小弟分享下我意見：
1.示威者暴力係會俾人拉，至今接近2000人被捕
2.黑警過分武力毫無管制，0調查/停職/被捕
3.黑社會打示威者沒俾人拉，的士佬撞人仲有錢賺

可以用以上幾點回復D 5毛令到其他外國支持我地D人了解情況係幾甘不對等，不公義。
以下簡單英文翻譯下比你地直接Copy n Paste 上去：
It is ignorant to compare the protesters' violence with the police brutality and communist government's suppression. There are almost 2000 protesters arrested while there are 0 police officers arrested or even suspended for shooting students at point blank, firing rubber bullets towards a journalist's eye, violent beatings towards protesters causing near death bone fractures. Triads or pro-government people inflict severe injuries towards protesters without any repercussions(A pro-government taxi driver pinned 2 protesters with his taxi breaking their legs and causing potentially permanent damage received 7000USD and face no charges at all) So stop whining about violent protesters before reading some uncensored news!
之後就自己補圖啦
P牌沒人理
